Title: Day of the Moon (2)
Plot:
Location: Utah, Washington D.C., New York City
Date: 1969
Enemies: The Silence

The Doctor is locked in the perfect prison. Amy, Rory and River Song are being hunted down across America by the FBI. With the help of new friend and FBI-insider, Canton Everett Delaware the Third, our heroes are reunited to share their discoveries, if not their memories. For the world is occupied by an alien force who control humanity through post-hypnotic suggestion and no one can be trusted. Aided by President Nix
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Alex Kingston, Mark Sheppard, Stuart Milligan, Sydney Wade, Marnix Van Den Broeke, Chukwudi Iwuji, Frances Barber, Kerry Shale, Mark Griffin, Tommy Campbell, Alex Giannini
